channel.title: Basic Linux Commands on KOOMPI OS
channel.description: Recent content in Basic Linux Commands on KOOMPI OS

item.title: Files/Folders
item.description: This document is a guide for information related to Files and Folders. All the Command lines will be provided here with the explanation plus the example. For more details of the instruction, see KOOMPI OS website articles or the various program section, both linked from this guide. Create File Knowing how to create a new file is an important skill for anyone using open-source regularly. You can create a new file either from the command line or from the desktop file manager.

item.title: GitHub
item.description: This module is a guide for details and usage of github. If you are a newbie especialy coding beginners and get to know what it is. Install git We can start to install git by run a command in konsole: pi -S git Make sure you have already run command pi -Syu to update your system. Clone an existing repository If you want to clone your existing repository or you clone other people’s repository, you run command below:
